data.text:
@Thisblackwolf @MichealMartinTD 🇮🇪 Govt could control covid with

* Indoor air standards: CO2 monitors, HEPA filters
* Free FFP2 mask mandate in shared spaces
* Free antivirals from pharmacies 
* Free testing
* Supported isolation 
* Promote vax more
* Resource Public Health teams
* Resource #LongCOVID

etc.

@VickiMahony @MichealMartinTD With 30% positive, numbers are entirely meaningless. Absolutely insanity to remove mask requirements at this point.
It looks to me like a deliberate decision to just pretend there isnâ€™t a problem.
@VickiMahony @MichealMartinTD Im curious as to what you think he can do? Not trolling you but what steps should be taken?
@VickiMahony @DrMaireadDB @MichealMartinTD Do you not realise it is over ..if they ignore it hard enough it will go away this is obviously the new covid strategy
@VickiMahony @fibromy @MichealMartinTD Most people not tested & those who are taking antigen tests & testing positive are not registering them. We have no idea no. of cases.
@VickiMahony @MichealMartinTD Why are the self-reported positive antigen tests not counted as official cases?
